newsitem.title: GERMANY: Daimler 9-mo sales growth 10 pct - newsletter.
newsitem.headline: Daimler 9-mo sales growth 10 pct - newsletter.

text.p: German industrial giant Daimler-Benz AG is due to report nine-month turnover growth of 10 percent, excluding its now-discontinued AEG businesses, German newsletter Platow Brief said on Tuesday.
The newsletter said the figures, due on Thursday, would show group sales had risen to some 75 billion marks.
Turnover for its Mercedes-Benz vehicle unit, at 57 billion, would, however, show growth of less than the 10 percent showed by the group as a whole, it added.
Its Dasa aerospace unit and Debis information systems arm would for the nine months show sales growth of 14 percent and 13 percent, respectively, the newsletter reported.
A spokesman for Daimler said in response to enquiries that the company was not commenting on the report.
